thread.title: 'Do I still need a foreign will to cover my European holiday home?'
thread.title_full: 'Do I still need a foreign will to cover my European holiday home?'

author: Nicole Blackmore
title: 'Do I still need a foreign will to cover my European holiday home?'
text: Buy two get one free: welcome to the new pensions system 'Do I still need a foreign will to cover my European holiday home?' Ask an Expert: New legislation known as Brussels IV has given Britons with holiday homes throughout the EU more freedoms British nationals will be able to elect for UK inheritance law to apply to their European holiday home instead of local rules. Photo: (c) Vasiliki Varvaki
